隑字的基本解释

qí
古同“碕”，曲岸。

隑
gāi
梯子。
方言，依靠。

隑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gāi］
［《集韻》柯開切，平咍，見。］
(1)方言。梯子。
(2)方言。斜靠；倚靠。
[②]［qí］
［《集韻》渠希切，平微，羣。］
同“碕1”。
弯曲的岸。参见“隑2州”。
[③]［ái］
［《廣韻》五來切，平咍，疑。］
见“隑3隑”。

隑字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　隑； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1358第01
【集韻】柯開切，音該。【玉篇】梯也。【揚子·方言】隑，陭也。【註】江南人呼梯爲隑，所以隑物而登者也。　又【揚子·方言】隑企，立也。東齊海岱北燕之郊，委痿謂之隑企。【註】脚躄不能行也。　又【廣韻】五來切【集韻】魚開切，?音獃。【廣韻】企立也。　又【博雅】修長也。　又【集韻】【韻會】?渠希切，音祁。本作崎。曲岸也。亦作碕埼。【史記·司馬相如傳】臨曲江之隑州。【註】隑，長也。索隱曰：隑音祁。卽碕字，謂曲岸頭也。　又【集韻】魚衣切，音沂。又【類篇】五亥切，音愷。義?同。　又【集韻】巨代切。【玉篇】梯也。【博雅】陭也。　又【集韻】【類篇】?口漑切，音慨。又【集韻】戸代切，音瀣。義?同。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Collections】【Fu Character Department】　隑; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1358 No. 01
[Ji Yun] Ke Kaiqie, the sound should be. [Jade articles] The ladder is also. 【Yangtze Dialect】Qian, Weiye. [Note] People from Jiangnan call the ladder for 隑, so the people who climbed the 隑wu are also.　[Yangtze Dialect] 隑Qi, Li Ye. The suburbs of the East Qihai Daibeiyan, Weiwei is called the "Qianqi". [Note] You can’t do it with your feet.　[Guangyun] Five to cut [Jiyun] The fish is cut open again, and the sound is dull. [Guang Yun] Enterprise is also established.　[Bo Ya] Also slender.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui]? Qu Xiqie, Yin Qi. This is Saki. Qu An also. Also known as Diaocheng. [Historical Records · Sima Xiangru Biography] Linqu River's Yuanzhou. [Note] Qian, Chang Ye. Suo Yin said: Jiao Yinqi. The word 卽碕 means Qu Antou also.　[Jiyun] Yuyi cut, sound Yi. Also 【Classes】Five Haiqie, Yinkai. Righteous? Same.　 [Ji Yun] Ju Dai cut. [Jade articles] The ladder is also. [Bo Ya] Ye Ye.　[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Mouth cut, sound. Also 【Jiyun】Diddai cut, sound 瀣. Righteous? Same.

gāi

方: 梯子 ladder; staircase
